title: (x) Jeremy Liebman sans serif text face - Berthold Akzidenz-Grotesk {Anthony Rubolotta}
content:
Hi guys, I know this is probably a easy one, but would you tell me what fonts are used in this image? Especially in the lower light blue Caps line  
Thanks In Advance

author: mariano

comments.content: I think it's the lovely and talented [Akzidenz Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812175755/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/akzidenz-grotesk-bq/)
I believe youÂ´re right. thanks very much
